title: Integrated Historical Thinking and Writing Strategy Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and high school-level history comprehension
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based learning content, combining offline workshops with online assignments.

learning_goals: Perform evaluative writing within 300 characters by critically analyzing historical sources
Apply a three-stage reading-thinking-writing strategy to compose scientific-context historical narratives
Improve the completeness of written content by 20% through peer feedback and self-revision

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
